attributes.action: SKY NEWS 'No Excuse' For Teenage Looters In London
attributes.additional_details:
12th August 2011. Sky News Managed to Contact and set up a meeting with these midless idiots concerning the London riots. They should do the honourable thing and hand the details over to the police as they know where to contact them.... The Government should demand that they disclose all information so that these idiotic thieves should be brought to justice

http://news.sky.com/home/uk-news/article/16048584
